document_data.name: Nun
document_data.mainbody: '''Nun''' was a small village on the [[Vilhon Reach]] filled with priests.
document_data.History:
Nun rested on the site of the [[Battle of Nun]] (part of the [[Rotting War]] conflict of [[902 DR]].

As of [[1357 DR]], Nun was occasionally raided by an [[orc]] tribe named the [[Flaming Spike]]. The tribe lived in an ancient [[dwarf|dwarven]] hold in the [[Akanapeaks]].<ref name ="OE-52">
document_data.Religion:
Nun was often refereed to as a shrine rather than a village because the majority of its inhabitants were [[priest]]s.

Although Nun was filled with followers of numerous faiths, [[Tempus]] was the most prominent. There were also notable shrines to [[Silvanus]] and [[Tyr]].
document_data.Politics: Nun was a peaceful village and avoided getting involved in the politics of its region.
